page.title: 06Sturdy Electrics
page.content: The factory has been in production for 31 years.The factory produces transformers and transformer base products.There are 6 stages in the making of the products:the design, the winding,the corecutting,the tank manufactures,the tank assembly,the testing and the dispatch. When finished the articles go all over the world.They go to their destination by sea,road and a few by air.The transformers cost from Â£10 to Â£30,000 to produce.There are 28 employees,10 men and 18 women.They get an average wage of Â£70 a week.Most of the employees live locally and only one lives away.
